DOC.brief_summary: The objective propose research conduct within-subject , experimental study describe mother ' feeding practice typical bottle-feeding condition examine whether removal visual cue related amount milk/formula bottle alter feeding practice . The investigator hypothesize mother show high level infant-directed feeding practice low level mother-directed feeding practice use opaque , weight bottle compare use standard , clear bottle . The investigator also hypothesize infant consume less breast milk formula feed opaque , weight bottle compare fed standard , clear bottle .
DOC.criteria: Mothers must 18 year old Infants must 0 6months age Infants must prior introduction solid food Preterm birth Medical condition interfere feed
